title: Designer: expand brain editor interactions
description: Add richer Designer capabilities: canvas-based neuron layout and pan/zoom, mouse-drawn axon routing with visual edges, region paging for large neuron counts, and support for exporting NBS snapshots from edited brains.

title: Designer spawn: HiveMind placement + shard splitting
description: Wire Designer spawn to HiveMind-managed placement (spawn BrainHost, request placement, and let RegionHosts register shards). Implement shard plan options (fixed count / max neurons per shard with stride alignment) and update RegionHost launch to follow shard plan + output sink routing.

title: Workbench shell + IO/Obs wiring
description: Implement Workbench shell, panels, and wiring for IO/Settings/Observability.

title: RegionShard: send SignalBatchAck on batch receipt
description: Ensure RegionShard (or its router) responds to SignalBatch with SignalBatchAck (brain_id/region_id/shard_id/tick_id) so BrainSignalRouter can complete TickDeliver.
close_reason: RegionShardActor already sends SignalBatchAck on receipt; verified wiring.

title: Log error when routing snapshot missing for brain with shards
description: When a brain has registered shards but routing snapshot is empty, HiveMind should log an error (and record telemetry if available) instead of silently skipping.
acceptance_criteria: Error is emitted when routing snapshot is missing while shards exist; no silent skip.

title: Define VisualizationHub subscriptions
description: Add subscribe/unsubscribe messages to nbn_viz.proto and update Visualizer/clients to use them for event streaming. Current VizHub only supports PID-based subscribe without standardized proto.

title: Add test coverage for RegisterBrain PID normalization
description: Create unit test to ensure RegisterBrain normalizes empty-address router PID using brain root or sender address.
acceptance_criteria: Test verifies normalized router PID address is non-empty after RegisterBrain.

title: Workbench observability filters
description: Add richer viz/debug filtering and detail panes (event selection, payload preview, export).

title: Wire HiveMind placement updates to BrainRoot routing tables
description: Add HiveMind-side plumbing to build routing tables for BrainSignalRouter and send SetRoutingTable updates to each BrainRoot when shard placement changes.

title: Designer: Surface validation results near Validate button
description: Validation results should be visible near the Validate button, not only at the bottom of the page.

title: Feed OutputCoordinator from RegionShard outputs
description: Emit OutputEvent/OutputVectorEvent from RegionShards or BrainSignalRouter and wire them to OutputCoordinator.EmitOutput/EmitOutputVector so external subscribers receive outputs.

title: Visualizer: implement Neural Activity View per NBNv2 design plan
description:
Build out the Visualizer Neural Activity View from placeholder to functional view aligned with NBNv2 design/architecture docs.

Scope (broad):
- Define and implement rendering model for neuron/edge activity and tick correlation
- Integrate region focus/zoom and filtering semantics with live streams
- Establish performance strategy for large brain/region views (sampling, culling, paging)
- Add interaction model (selection, hover details, navigation) and state sync with Brain selection
- Add tests for rendering state transforms and key interaction flows
- Document UX/ops behavior and limits

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text:
Groundwork pass completed: introduced a Visualizer activity projection scaffold (region/edge/tick summaries + stats), wired it into VizPanelViewModel with options (tick window, low-signal filtering, region focus), and replaced placeholder-only panel markup with a structured scaffold view + stream inspection surface.

Implementation slices planned from here:
1) Canvas renderer + layout engine for node/edge/tick overlays
2) Interaction model (selection/hover/pin/navigation) with detail panes
3) Performance path (sampling, culling, tick-window virtualization, backpressure UX)
4) Visualizer-specific tests and UX/operator docs for limits and behavior

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Delivered interaction slice: canvas select/hover/pin/navigation plus interaction summaries and keyboard shortcuts. Also extended layout tests for interaction-state rendering. NBNv2-547.1 closed; NBNv2-547.2 in_progress for docs + broader test surface.

title: Visualizer: add activity interaction model (select/hover/pin/navigation)
description: Implement interaction behavior for Neural Activity view: hover tooltips, selection state, pinned entities, keyboard navigation, and synchronized detail panel updates with selected brain/region.
close_reason: Interaction model implemented and validated with Release build/tests.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Implemented activity interaction model in Workbench Visualizer: canvas node/edge selection, hover and right-click pin/unpin, keyboard navigation (Alt+Left/Right), focus navigation (Alt+Enter), pin toggle (Alt+P), and interaction reset (Esc). Added interaction summaries and pinned summaries in-panel, synchronized with projection refresh and region focus/filter navigation.

title: Visualizer: add projection/interaction test suite + UX docs
description: Add comprehensive tests for projection transforms and interaction state transitions, then document Visualizer behavior, controls, and operational limits for Workbench users/operators.
notes: Regression fix for finicky canvas completeness: full-brain canvas now uses uncapped projection node/edge rows; only snapshot panel applies top-N trimming.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Added interaction-state regression tests in VizActivityCanvasLayoutBuilderTests (selection/hover/pin flags + visual emphasis). Remaining work for this issue is UX/operator documentation and any additional end-to-end interaction tests.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Extended projection test surface with prefixed region/address parsing (R#/R#N#) and updated focus/tick-window expectations now that focus is non-culling.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: UX update: Projection Snapshot panel is now collapsible with default collapsed state to maximize canvas room; toggle added in Neural Activity View.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Added temporary diagnostics export path for validation: Ctrl+Shift+C now copies assembled visualizer state (filters/options, stats, canvas nodes/edges, and recent events) to clipboard and mirrors in payload pane for easy sharing.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Expanded test coverage for new canvas behavior: focus-mode neuron centering, interaction state with node-key selection, topology-only dormant edge/node rendering, and bidirectional focus gateway route classification.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Expanded renderer tests for signed activity encoding: added coverage asserting edge direction border is separate from interior activity channel, with positive/negative activity producing different interior colors and opacity/thickness behavior.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: UX adjustments: Visualization Stream is now default-collapsed with show/hide toggle; canvas tooltips are immediate (show delay 0); diagnostics now report definition topology source/status/roots tried. Input vector field now auto-suggests a sized sequence matching input width from BrainInfo.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Visualizer interaction stability pass: hover target now stays locked to the same node/edge until pointer leaves sticky tolerance, and panel pointer-move handling now uses short stability sampling to prevent transient hover clear/switch jitter. Added/updated tests in VizPanelViewModelInteractionTests, including overlapping node/edge sticky-edge precedence coverage.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Added regression test coverage for new topology hydration request behavior (dedupe on repeated ensure calls) in VizPanelViewModelInteractionTests.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Added/updated tests covering tick-rate override control path: HiveMind actor request/ack/status behavior and proto field compatibility checks for SetTickRateOverride + HiveMindStatus override fields.

title: Visualizer: implement neural activity canvas renderer + layout engine
description: Build actual Neural Activity canvas rendering on top of the new projection scaffold (region/edge/tick summaries). Include deterministic layout contracts, node/edge draw primitives, region focus anchoring, and tick-correlated visual states.
notes: Regression fix: removed projection row caps from canvas source data (regions/edges no longer truncated to top-N), so full-brain node/edge maps include complete in-window coverage. Snapshot side panel remains intentionally capped in VM for readability.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Addressed no-canvas rendering report: projection no longer culls edge rows by FocusRegionId, and Visualizer default focus now starts as full-brain (blank focus). Added explicit 'Full brain' reset control in Viz panel to clear focus/filter quickly.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Follow-up fix for empty edge visualization: RegionShard now emits route-addressed VizAxonSent events per outbox destination (source/target Address32 populated), replacing aggregate axon event-only emission. This enables projection edge route construction under live streams.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Patched VizPanel canvas layering to avoid zero-sized ItemsControl render layers (moved to fixed-size grid overlay, explicit node container placement), added copyable legend/interaction/pinned text, and moved snapshot toggle to upper-right outside the canvas area. Added Ctrl+Shift+C diagnostics copy to clipboard with payload fallback.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Implemented visualizer render/state refactor: decoupled interaction redraw from projection rebuild (hover/click stability), added persistent per-brain topology memory for regions/routes/neuron addresses, and introduced dual canvas modes (full-brain region graph + focused-region neuron/gateway graph with direction-aware edge colors and dormant topology visibility).

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Implemented definition-backed topology hydration path in Workbench Visualizer: on brain select/focus, it now requests ExportBrainDefinition (fallback BrainInfo.BaseDefinition), loads .nbn from artifact store, and seeds full region/route topology without waiting for stream activity. Added runtime support in HiveMind for ExportBrainDefinition/RequestSnapshot responses via IoGateway forwarding. Full-brain view can now render structural routes from definition data, and focused region mode can preload neuron/axon topology touching the focus region.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Crash hotfix: Workbench launch failure fixed by guarding VizActivityCanvasLayoutBuilder.BuildRegionEdges against empty aggregate sets. Startup path can now render region nodes with zero routes without throwing. Added regression test Build_DoesNotThrow_WhenRegionNodesExistWithoutAnyRoutes.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Follow-up interaction/topology pass: improved edge direction visibility (thicker direction border + dash line types), split hover handling to avoid canvas re-render flicker, added tap handlers for node/edge selection, and expanded definition artifact root discovery to include per-brain subdirectories so focus mode can hydrate neuron/axon topology beyond activity stream-only nodes.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Added definition-reference propagation for Visualizer topology hydration: BrainHost now accepts/registers nbn/nbs artifact refs (--nbn-sha256/--nbn-size/--artifact-store-uri), Designer and Orchestrator now pass those args when launching BrainHost, and IoGateway now serves ExportBrainDefinition/RequestSnapshot directly from its registered brain metadata (with HiveMind fallback + cache update). Added integration tests for IoGateway export/snapshot local metadata responses. Note: brains already running without BaseDefinition metadata still report source=none until re-registered or respawned.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Improved Visualizer interaction + stability: replaced per-item hover/click with canvas-level hit resolution, added persistent hover detail card near pointer (copyable text), widened edge hit-test stroke, and included hover summaries with event/tick values. Fixed UI lock/crash path by bounding visualizer event flush work per UI dispatch pass (MaxEventsPerUiFlush=256) instead of unbounded while-loop on UI thread. Added layout tests for dense focus-mode graphs and hit-test thickness assertions.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Added tick-aware render coalescing in VizPanel: streaming refresh now runs at most on cadence and only when a new tick is observed for the current selection (with forced render on queue drain), reducing dense-focus relayout pressure. Reduced per-dispatch stream batch size to 96 events. Also lowered local Workbench HiveMind launch defaults to --tick-hz 8 --min-tick-hz 2 as temporary safety baseline.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Addressed remaining high-CPU/freeze symptoms in focused region view: (1) focused edge renderer now collapses gateway fan-out routes by displayed endpoints (e.g., repeated N0->R8 merges into one visual edge), cutting edge count and hit-test load; (2) stream queue now drops oldest pending events above cap (1600) and schedules continuation at Dispatcher background priority; (3) streaming tick gating now uses focus-aware tick detection (events touching focus region only) so unrelated brain activity no longer forces full focused-canvas rebuilds.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Workbench integration now drives runtime viz scope (not just hub subscription): Shell updates active visualization brain + optional focus region from current Visualizer state, and WorkbenchClient sends SetBrainVisualization to HiveMind. This keeps behavior generic for any future client and aligns visual stream production with selected brain/view scope.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Fix pass for missing topology in full-brain/focus views: added definition-hydration request dedupe and periodic retry trigger from refresh flow, so large graph structure repopulates even if initial artifact lookup misses. Also expanded artifact root probing (repo artifacts, demo paths, current/base directories) to improve definition discovery across launch modes.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Completed runtime/workbench fixes for visualizer regression + controls: fixed focus/full definition topology coverage gating (added full-topology coverage flag + SHA reset path), added HiveMind tick-rate temporary override protocol + handling, and surfaced override controls in Visualizer (apply/clear). Added HiveMind and proto compatibility tests; release build/test green (106 passed).

title: Visualizer: performance pipeline for large brains (sampling/culling/windowing)
description: Implement scalable rendering/data pipeline for large activity volumes: adaptive sampling, edge/node culling, tick-window virtualization, and guardrails for UI responsiveness under sustained event rates.
notes: Completed child tasks NBNv2-547.4.4 and NBNv2-547.4.6 in this session with tests and quality gates green.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Implemented runtime-controlled visualization emission gating: added generic control-plane messages SetBrainVisualization and UpdateShardVisualization, wired HiveMind to propagate enable/disable + optional focus region scope to shards, and gated RegionShard viz emission accordingly. This reduces actor traffic when Visualizer is inactive and allows region-scoped emission in focused view.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Perf-adjacent interaction refinement: reduced unnecessary hover state churn by adding hover sample stabilization in VizPanel pointer handling and prioritizing sticky hover resolution before full hit scans in VizPanelViewModel. This lowers relayout/summary churn under dense canvas hover jitter while preserving selection semantics.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Addressed current Visualizer regressions: (1) constrained region/node/edge layout to keep full-brain content in view bounds, (2) extended focus-mode gateway tooltip details with aggregate region metrics parity, and (3) enabled horizontal scrolling fallback in VizPanel. Added focused tests in VizActivityCanvasLayoutBuilderTests; full Release test gate passes.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Visualizer interaction/layout follow-up: stabilized hover persistence (longer clear delay + stronger sticky tolerances + deterministic hit tie-breaks), shifted edge endpoints/loops outside node bodies to improve readability/hitability, fixed node radius jitter by stabilizing diameters, and changed buffer tooltip formatting to report avg/latest as n/a when buffer samples are absent. Added regression tests for endpoint/loop geometry, no-buffer formatting, and stable region node diameter.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Visualizer semantics pass: added color-mode selector (State priority, Activity priority, Topology reference) with in-panel hint/legend text; base fill can now prioritize signed value using colorblind-safe blue/orange diverging mapping, while activity remains in pulse/opacity and topology in border. Also updated value metrics to aggregate from axon+fired+buffer events (not buffer-only), tightened self-loop geometry, and increased hover retention to reduce tooltip flicker/dropouts.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Follow-up UX tuning after user validation: reduced hover over-stickiness (shorter clear delay, smaller sticky paddings, no unconditional keep-alive on pointer move, smarter pointer-exit retention), fixed options-row overlap by widening control columns, wrapped legend text, and moved horizontal scrolling from page-level to canvas-only ScrollViewer to remove whole-page left/right jitter.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Hover over-stickiness follow-up: adjusted VizPanel hover stabilization so no-hit samples schedule deferred clear instead of repeatedly forcing keep-alive. Also gated keep-alive during throttled pointer moves behind retention distance. This fixes tooltip persistence when pointer moves off target and then stops, while preserving sticky switch behavior.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Adjusted full-brain region layout to reduce one-dimensional horizontal sprawl: compressed axial x-span, added deterministic slice undulation, and increased center-mass-biased in-slice spread so axial layers remain readable without nodes hugging canvas extremes. Added regression tests for vertical spread across slices and compact horizontal span.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Focused-region dense layout + hover follow-up: replaced single-ring focus neuron placement with bounded concentric packing to avoid node overlap in high-neuron regions, with spacing/ring-gap safeguards when nearing orbit limits. Also split hover hit-testing from click hit-testing (stricter hover thresholds/sticky tolerance, click remains forgiving) to prevent tooltip persistence when pointer is off-target. Added regression tests for dense focus non-overlap and hover-vs-click strictness.

title: Visualizer perf: replace edge/node ItemsControls with single draw surface
description: Current canvas renders many per-item visuals (multiple Paths per edge). Replace with a custom draw surface that renders edges/nodes in one pass with retained draw resources.
acceptance_criteria: R24-like cases (>=40 neurons, >=350 routes) remain interactive without lockups; canvas visual tree node count reduced materially from baseline.

title: Visualizer R&D: optional 3D region layout using distance-model coordinates
description: Investigate and prototype a toggleable 3D region layout mode that uses NBN region-distance semantics to position regions, with graceful fallback to 2D when performance is insufficient.
acceptance_criteria: Prototype defines region coordinate mapping that respects NBN axial distance model constraints; Rendering path includes explicit perf guardrails and fallback behavior to maintain smooth interaction; Interaction model (hover/select/pin/tooltips) remains coherent in 3D mode; Document tradeoffs and go/no-go criteria for productionizing 3D mode; dotnet build/test Release with disabled build servers remains green.

title: Visualizer follow-up: tooltip release and node-first hit precedence
description: Address remaining hover-targeting regressions in Visualizer interaction: tooltip can remain visible after pointer leaves all targets/off-canvas, and edge hit resolution can still win in ambiguous zones where pointer is clearly inside a node. Scope this issue to tooltip lifecycle and deterministic target precedence only.
acceptance_criteria: 1) Hover tooltip clears after leaving all targets/off-canvas (no target switch required), with bounded delay and no permanent persistence. 2) If pointer is inside a node circle, node must always win hover and click target resolution over edges. 3) Keep click usability forgiving, but hover hit path should not cling off-target. 4) Add/adjust regression tests for hover clear behavior and node-over-edge precedence; Release build/test passes.
close_reason: Completed implementation and regression coverage; Release tests pass.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Layout-related follow-up split out to NBNv2-547.4.12 so this issue stays focused on tooltip release + node-first target precedence.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Implemented node-inside-circle precedence over sticky edges for click+hover resolution, changed retained no-hit hover path to arm deferred clear, added/updated Viz interaction regressions for node-over-edge precedence and hover clear behavior, and updated NBNv2_Design.md Aleph reliability guidance (codex executable/API prerequisites). Verified with dotnet test -c Release --disable-build-servers.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Post-close follow-up after user validation: fixed throttled pointer-move hover lifecycle in VizPanel so keep-alive now requires a real current hover hit; if none is found, deferred clear is armed. This prevents tooltip persistence when pointer drifts off-target without triggering a full hover sample. Verified with dotnet test -c Release --disable-build-servers.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Second follow-up after user repro: tightened hover probing to center-point only in VizPanel pointer hover path (removed hover near-miss probe offsets) so hover no longer latches via adjacent probe hits when pointer is off-target. Click probing remains unchanged/forgiving. Verified with dotnet test -c Release --disable-build-servers.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Third follow-up after continued repro: made no-hit hover clear deterministic/immediate in VizPanel pointer handling (throttled move no-hit, pointer-exit, and no-hit hover resolution now call ClearCanvasHover directly), and reduced hover-clear sample gating to 1 to prevent indefinite defer re-arming while pointer is moving. Also increased whole-brain vertical region spread in BuildRegionPositions (larger slice wave + lane height scaling) per UX feedback.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Fourth follow-up after continued repro: removed hover pointer-move throttling in VizPanel (always resolves hover each move) to eliminate intermittent stale hover state that could survive throttle windows; hover clear remains deterministic immediate on no-hit paths. Also disabled horizontal scrollbar for viz canvas container and further compressed whole-brain horizontal spread while increasing effective vertical separation.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Fifth follow-up: added root-level pointer fallback handlers to clear hover whenever pointer is outside canvas bounds, while also keeping per-canvas move-based hover resolution unthrottled. This is intended to remove the remaining intermittent permanent tooltip cases. Also increased whole-brain vertical spacing again (larger slice wave/lane height) and further reduced horizontal spread.

title: Visualizer layout follow-up: no-overlap guarantees and adaptive spacing
description: Address remaining layout clarity issues in full-brain and focus-region canvases: overlaps can still occur, dense regions need larger placement radii/separation, and edge radial spacing should increase when canvas room exists. Scope is layout/geometry only (separate from tooltip lifecycle).
acceptance_criteria: 1) Focus-region layout for dense neuron counts (>=40) increases placement radii and node spacing adaptively, with no node overlap at rendered diameters. 2) Whole-brain layout enforces non-overlap for region nodes under full 32-region population. 3) Edge radial spacing/arc separation expands when available room exists to improve readability without pushing nodes out of bounds. 4) Add/adjust regression tests for dense focus spacing, whole-brain overlap constraints, and edge separation behavior; Release build/test passes.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Spawned from NBNv2-547.4.11 split request; tracks remaining layout/spacing/overlap work separately from tooltip lifecycle behavior.

title: Visualizer perf: move projection/layout build off UI thread
description: Run projection and layout synthesis on a background worker and publish immutable snapshots to UI; keep UI thread for lightweight apply only.
acceptance_criteria: Projection/layout computation no longer blocks UI input; pointer/click/scroll stay responsive during sustained event ingress.

title: Visualizer perf: incremental keyed diff updates for canvas collections
description: Stop full clear/rebuild of CanvasNodes/CanvasEdges on refresh; apply keyed add/update/remove deltas so unchanged items are retained.
acceptance_criteria: No full collection reset when graph topology is unchanged; reduced allocations and smoother frame-to-frame updates.
notes: Implemented incremental keyed diff updates for CanvasNodes/CanvasEdges in VizPanelViewModel (no full clear/rebuild on stable topology). Added regression test for keyed diff reordering/retention.
close_reason: Incremental keyed diff pipeline implemented and validated by Workbench tests.

title: Visualizer perf: spatial index + throttled hover hit-testing
description: Replace O(edge-count) pointer-move hit testing with broad-phase spatial lookup and bounded precise checks; throttle pointer processing cadence.
acceptance_criteria: Hover/select remains stable with dense graphs (>=500 edges) and pointer-move CPU spikes are eliminated.
notes: Implemented throttled pointer-move processing, spatial broad-phase hit index in VizPanelViewModel, and sticky hover near-miss tolerance; added interaction tests (VizPanelViewModelInteractionTests).
close_reason: Implemented and validated via Release build + tests

title: Visualizer perf: cache typed edge geometry instead of regenerating path strings
description: Avoid rebuilding path-data strings every refresh; cache/reuse typed bezier geometry keyed by route endpoints/layout version.
acceptance_criteria: Edge geometry generation cost drops significantly on steady topology; repeated frames reuse cached geometry artifacts.
notes: Implemented edge-curve cache keyed by source/target/control topology to reuse precomputed Bezier control points and path strings across frames. Added deterministic reuse assertion in VizActivityCanvasLayoutBuilderTests to verify repeated builds share cached path artifacts.

title: Runtime perf: skip viz aggregation in RegionShard CPU backend when viz is off/scope-filtered
description: Bypass axon/fired visualization aggregation work in RegionShardCpuBackend when brain visualization is disabled or route is out of current focus scope.
acceptance_criteria: With visualization disabled for a brain, compute path performs no viz aggregation allocations and tick throughput is unaffected by viz plumbing.
notes: Added RegionShardVisualizationComputeScope to CPU backend and actor wiring so viz aggregation/allocation is skipped when disabled and reduced when focus-scoped; added RegionShardCpuBackendVisualizationTests.
close_reason: Implemented and validated via Release build + tests

title: Visualizer perf instrumentation: frame/layout/hit-test timing + queue depth diagnostics
description: Add measurable diagnostics for render frame time, projection time, layout time, hit-test time, queue depth, and drop counts to support performance tuning.
acceptance_criteria: Copy diagnostics includes new perf metrics and allows before/after comparison for each optimization issue.
notes: Added visualizer perf diagnostics for projection/layout/apply/frame timings, hit-test timing (last/avg/max/samples), queue depth/peak/drop counts, flush timing, and canvas diff stats. Included diagnostics coverage test.
close_reason: Perf instrumentation and diagnostics output landed with test coverage.

title: Visualizer perf: adaptive LOD policy for dense focus-region graphs
description: Introduce deterministic LOD controls (sampling/culling/aggregation thresholds) by zoom and edge density to keep large regions responsive while preserving signal semantics.
acceptance_criteria: Dense region views degrade gracefully under configurable budgets without lockups, and users can tune/disable LOD for fidelity testing.

title: Visualizer interaction: add performant pan/zoom viewport controls
description: Add optional 2D viewport controls for the Visualizer canvas (zoom + pan + reset) while preserving current interaction fidelity and responsiveness.
acceptance_criteria: Canvas supports zoom in/out with bounded scale and a reset-to-fit action; Canvas supports panning when zoomed without breaking node/edge hit-testing; Hover/selection tooltips stay anchored to the correct logical target under transform; Perf diagnostics remain within current budget for representative dense scenes; dotnet build/test Release with disabled build servers remains green.

title: Expand quantization/packing/invariant test coverage
description: Add Nbn.Tests coverage for quantization encode/decode edge cases, Address32/ShardId32 boundaries, neuron/axon packing limits, and invariant validation (input/output rules, sorted/duplicate axons).
acceptance_criteria: - Tests cover map types (linear/gamma signed/unsigned), center code mapping, and clamp behavior\n- Tests cover record boundaries (max codes, invalid values)\n- Invariant checks for IO restrictions and duplicate/sorted axon lists are exercised

title: Wire InputCoordinator drain into tick delivery
description: Input writes are currently buffered in BrainSignalRouter and forwarded to input shards during TickDeliver. InputCoordinator in IO is still unused. Wire a proper drain path so IO handles buffering per spec and router just delivers drained contributions.

title: Designer: Add help text for functions and params
description: Provide definitions/tooltips for activation/reset/accum functions and explain Param A/B and thresholds.

title: Fix Proto.Remote.GrpcNet package reference for Nbn.Runtime.IO
description: Solution build fails because Nbn.Runtime.IO depends on Proto.Remote.GrpcNet >= 1.8.0, which is not available on NuGet (nearest 0.27.1-alpha.0.45). Update package reference or feed so restore succeeds.
close_reason: Added Proto.Remote.GrpcNet package references to runtime projects; restore/build succeeds.

title: Improve New Random Brain generation quality and topology
description: Rework random brain generation so produced brains are more useful: better constrained axon creation, role-aware function sampling, and topology-aware connectivity while preserving NBN invariants.

title: Designer: Disable Param A/B inputs when unused
description: Disable Param A/Param B inputs for functions that do not use them.
close_reason: Resolved in Designer panel UI updates

title: Designer: Keep axon link button visually active when mode is on
description: Axon link button should remain highlighted and possibly change text while link mode is active.
close_reason: Axon link button stays highlighted via bound accent styling and toggled label.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Not addressed in this change set.

title: Designer: Combine Cost/Energy checkbox in Snapshot Defaults
description: Snapshot Defaults should use a single Cost+Energy toggle instead of separate checkboxes.

title: Wire HiveMind to IO register/energy updates
description: Have HiveMind send RegisterBrain with input/output widths and artifact refs, plus ApplyTickCost per tick so IO energy enforcement can fire.

title: Designer: Fix region canvas not updating for new/other neurons
description: Resolve region canvas issues where only the selected neuron renders and new neurons do not appear until selection changes/zoom; verify paging logic.

title: Refactor Designer layout and region map readability
description: Reduce Designer UI density, allocate more space to workspace/map, and redesign neuron/axon map presentation with clearer grouping, directionality, and internal vs external edge semantics.

title: Add cost accounting + timing metrics for RegionShard TickComputeDone
description: Compute tick costs and timing details in RegionShard and populate TickComputeDone fields (cost breakdown + compute_ms).
acceptance_criteria: TickComputeDone includes meaningful cost breakdowns and compute duration.

title: Designer: Add spawn brain action with validation and host startup
description: Add a Designer option to spawn the current brain; require validation (auto-run if needed) and fail if validation fails; ensure HiveMind handles sharding/placement; start RegionHost(s) if none are running with configurable options.
notes: Groundwork in progress: added spawn options + RegionHost detection scaffolding.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Plan: 1) Add Designer spawn options model + UI (placement mode, RegionHost start policy, shard plan/limits). 2) Build spawn planner that auto-runs validation, parses options, and checks Settings node list for RegionHosts; auto-start locals if none. 3) Wire HiveMind-managed placement + shard splitting (stride-aligned), then refine RegionHost launch + output sink wiring.

title: Implement NBN binary reader/writer + validator
description: Add shared-library readers/writers for .nbn and .nbs (headers, region sections, overlays) plus a validator that enforces stride/checkpoint rules, region spans, axon ordering/dupes, and input/output invariants.
acceptance_criteria: - Public read/write APIs for NbnHeaderV2, region sections, NbsHeaderV2, region state sections, and overlays\n- Validation reports errors for invalid spans/offsets/stride/checkpoints and IO/axon invariants\n- Minimal NBN/NBS vectors roundtrip via the API

title: Workbench/demo leaves dotnet host processes running
description: Investigate cleanup for Workbench LocalServiceRunner/LocalDemoRunner; dotnet host processes sometimes remain after Stop/exit. Confirm whether dotnet run spawns child processes and ensure teardown kills them or switch to dotnet exec.

title: Add telemetry for delivery timeouts/late acks
description: Record metrics/telemetry for TickDeliver timeouts or late SignalBatchAck arrivals (BrainSignalRouter or HiveMind).
close_reason: Added BrainTelemetry counters for delivery timeouts and late acks in BrainSignalRouter.

title: Designer: Clarify or remove Tick input in Snapshot Details
description: The Tick field in Snapshot Details is unclear; clarify its meaning or remove it.
close_reason: Resolved in Designer panel UI updates

title: RegionHost shard spawning registers with HiveMind
description: When RegionHost spawns RegionShard actors, send RegisterShard/UnregisterShard to HiveMind (and/or BrainRoot) so routing tables stay current. Provide HiveMind PID hookup in RegionHost startup or shard creation pipeline.

title: Wire RegionHost startup to spawn RegionShard actors from artifacts
description: Add RegionHost startup wiring to load .nbn/.nbs artifacts, construct RegionShard actors via RegionShardArtifactLoader, and set router/output/tick PIDs.
acceptance_criteria: RegionHost can spawn RegionShard actors from artifact refs and wires real router/output/tick PIDs.

title: Add artifact compression settings
description: Expose artifact store chunk compression settings (kind, level, min bytes, only-if-smaller) in SettingsMonitor so nodes can configure CAS compression.
notes: Added artifact chunk compression default settings and store helpers.

title: Add local demo script for HiveMind + BrainRoot + RegionHost
description: Add a small demo script that spins up HiveMind, BrainRoot, and a RegionHost shard locally to exercise registration and the tick barrier end-to-end.

title: Fix TickDeliver routing to go via BrainRoot (fallback to router)
description: HiveMind should send TickDeliver to BrainRoot per spec, with SignalRouter fallback if BrainRoot missing. Current path skips BrainRoot and can timeout.
acceptance_criteria: TickDeliver is dispatched to BrainRoot when available; fallback only when BrainRoot is null; demo no longer logs deliver timeouts due to routing.

title: Designer pass 2: deep interaction polish and visual analytics
description: Follow-up sweep for remaining Designer polish: richer edge bundling/arrowheads, interaction affordances for dense regions, and additional usability validation from operator feedback.
close_reason: Implemented Designer pass 2 polish: curved bundled edges with arrowheads, clickable off-page edge navigation, edge analytics summary, and Aleph sub-query packet guidance update in NBNv2_Design.md.

title: Designer: Add clear/reset brain action with export confirmation
description: Provide a clear/reset brain option that confirms if current state has not been exported.

title: Add ArtifactRef and Sha256 hex helpers
description: Provide shared helpers to convert between domain types and protobuf ArtifactRef/Sha256, including optional hex string formatting/parse for display/logging.
acceptance_criteria: - Helpers exist for ArtifactRef and Sha256 (byte[]/ByteString) conversions\n- Optional hex encode/decode utilities (if needed by UI/logging)\n- Tests cover round-trips and invalid inputs

title: Designer: Add axon link destination labels for cross-region/page
description: When an axon targets another region or page, show a small label at the line end indicating destination.

title: Add Designer interaction tests for edge UX and navigation
description: Introduce test coverage for Designer edge interaction behavior added in el0: bundled edge metadata, off-page edge endpoint navigation, and analytics summary updates. Current repository scan shows no direct Workbench Designer canvas interaction tests.
notes: Starting implementation and test coverage work for Designer edge interaction behavior.
close_reason: Added Designer interaction tests for edge bundling, off-page navigation, and analytics summary; updated Aleph workflow docs and passed Release build/test gates.

title: Designer: Explain Brain Seed in Brain Setup
description: Add help text or tooltip to explain what Brain Seed does.

title: Do not skip ticks when routing snapshot is empty
description: HiveMind currently skips compute/deliver for brains with shards when RoutingSnapshot is empty. This should not bypass tick barrier; use shard registry and still dispatch ticks.
acceptance_criteria: Brains with registered shards participate in tick barrier even if routing snapshot is empty; compute/deliver dispatch no longer returns early solely due to empty snapshot.

title: Export BrainTelemetry metrics via OpenTelemetry
description: Wire Nbn.Runtime.Brain BrainTelemetry meter into the runtime host (session/provider) so delivery timeout/late-ack metrics are exported when OTEL is enabled.

title: Extend HiveMind integration tests for timeout/backpressure
description: Add tests that simulate compute/deliver stalls to verify timeouts, late arrivals, and backpressure adjustments in HiveMind.

title: Normalize router PID in RegisterBrain when address missing
description: RegisterBrain should normalize router PID address using sender or brain root address when missing, matching UpdateBrainSignalRouter behavior.
acceptance_criteria: RegisterBrain stores router PID with non-empty address when brain root address is known; empty-address router PIDs no longer persisted in remote scenarios.

title: Designer: Add New Random Brain flow with options
description: Add a New Random Brain action with configurable region count and neuron/axon generation options (likely via popup or dedicated card).
notes: Plan: 1) Centralize random-brain settings in a RandomBrainOptions VM (seed, IO sizes, strength/connectivity + advanced placeholders). 2) Wire basic options into generation with validation and guardrails for unsupported advanced modes. 3) Expand Designer UI to surface basic + advanced option sections; follow-up will implement region selection, range modes, function/threshold distributions, and target bias.

title: Random brain defaults to fixed functions/zero ranges
description: Random brain generation uses Fixed modes by default (Activation=ACT_TANH id 11, Reset=RESET_ZERO id 0, Accumulation=ACCUM_SUM id 0) and Threshold/Param ranges default to 0..0. This yields all-zero thresholds/params and identical functions across all neurons, producing mostly zero output unless manual inputs are sent. Consider switching defaults to Random/Weighted for functions and non-zero ranges for thresholds/params, or clarify in UI.
close_reason: Defaults updated to range/weighted and random generation improved.

title: Add HiveMind integration test harness with dummy shards/routers
description: Create an integration-style test in Nbn.Tests that spins up an ActorSystem with HiveMindActor and dummy shard/router actors to verify compute/deliver barriers, timeouts, and late arrivals are tracked.

title: Investigate persistent TickDeliver timeout in demo
description: Timeouts still occur in demo despite recent TickDeliver routing changes. Reproduce via tools/demo scripts, inspect HiveMind logs, and reconcile routing/ack flow with spec.
acceptance_criteria: Demo scripts complete without HiveMind TickDeliver timeouts; root cause documented if not fixed.
notes: Fixed demo TickDeliver timeouts; ensure sender PIDs in TickDeliver/SignalBatch; demo now emits SignalBatch traffic.

title: Workbench Designer wiring
description: Implement import/export/validate actions in Workbench Designer panel (file pickers, .nbn/.nbs load/save, validation results).

title: Update Workbench Visualizer for VizSubscribe
description: Update Nbn.Tools.Workbench visualizer client to send nbn.viz.VizSubscribe/VizUnsubscribe messages (new proto fields) instead of PID-only local messages.
close_reason: Already implemented: VizSubscribe/VizUnsubscribe messaging present in WorkbenchClient

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Verified implemented in current codebase: Workbench visualizer subscription path already sends Nbn.Proto.Viz.VizSubscribe / VizUnsubscribe with subscriber_actor via WorkbenchClient.ConnectObservabilityAsync and WorkbenchClient.DisconnectObservability (tools/Nbn.Tools.Workbench/Services/WorkbenchClient.cs).

title: Wire HiveMind tick barrier to real brain/shard actors
description: Connect HiveMindActor tick loop to real BrainRoot/BrainSignalRouter/RegionShard actors, including registry updates and delivery acks. Add metrics/telemetry hooks for timeouts/late arrivals and integrate reschedule/pause policy with SettingsMonitor/ShardPlacementManager.

title: Workspace canvas neurons overlap/stack
description: Designer workspace canvas still shows only one neuron because nodes render on top of each other (overlapping text labels). Investigate layout/spacing so multiple neurons are visible.
close_reason: Canvas item container now applies Canvas.Left/Top so neurons and labels no longer stack.

title: Add test for BrainRoot + external router delivery (DemoHost path)
description: Add a test where BrainRoot forwards to a separately spawned BrainSignalRouter (not parent) to cover the DemoHost pattern and TickDeliver path.
acceptance_criteria: Test asserts TickDeliver completes with external router wiring.

title: Designer: Default activation function to ACT_TANH
description: Use ACT_TANH as the default activation function for new neurons.
close_reason: Resolved in Designer panel UI updates

title: Designer: Fix Zoom input/slider layout in region canvas
description: Zoom input and slider overflow card and label overlaps; fix alignment.

title: HiveMind OTLP exporter and telemetry config
description: Add HiveMind OpenTelemetry configuration similar to Observability (env/CLI options, OTLP exporter setup) so new metrics/ActivitySource can be exported.

title: Add HiveMind tick metrics/telemetry (durations, timeouts, late arrivals)
description: Instrument HiveMind tick loop with counters/histograms for compute/deliver durations, timeout counts, and late arrivals. Provide ActivitySource hooks for tick phase spans if appropriate.

title: Enforce IO neuron function constraints across designer flows
description: Apply explicit input/output neuron function restrictions for random creation, manual edits, import normalization, and export validation. Ensure invalid combinations are prevented and clearly surfaced.

title: Observability events missing from stream
description: Workbench Visualizer/Debug streams are only showing output-derived events; no spawn/tick/axon/etc events appear even with All types selected. Investigate event emission across runtime (HiveMind/RegionHost/etc) and delivery to Observability hubs; confirm expected event catalog and add missing emitters.
close_reason: Added runtime observability emitters (HiveMind/RegionShard), enabled viz/debug remoting descriptors, and fixed Workbench viz routing.

title: Define UUID byte order for NBN artifacts
description: The .nbs header stores brain_id_uuid as 16 raw bytes and .proto Uuid uses bytes, but the canonical byte order isn't specified. Current C# IO uses Guid.ToByteArray()/new Guid(bytes), which is little-endian for the first fields. Decide and document the canonical UUID byte order for on-disk/on-wire formats and align IO code + tests accordingly.
acceptance_criteria: - NBNv2_Design.md specifies the UUID byte order for .nbn/.nbs and .proto Uuid bytes\n- NbnBinary read/write (and any other serializers) use the chosen order consistently\n- Tests cover byte-order roundtrips against a fixed UUID example
notes: Specified RFC 4122 byte order for UUID bytes; updated NbnBinary + tests.

title: Designer: Auto-exit axon link mode on completion
description: After creating an axon link (or re-clicking source), exit link mode or reset selection to make behavior clear.
close_reason: Exit axon link mode after Add Axon by ID succeeds.

comments.author: Hailey Collet
comments.text: Update close reason.
